jabber.stream.Connection

type
class
subclasses
jabber.BOSHConnection, jabber.WebSocketConnection, jabber.stream.SocketConnection
available in
flash, js, neko, php
Abstract base class for stream connections.

Instance Variables

__onConnect : Void -> Void

Succesfully connected callback

__onData : haxe.io.Bytes -> Int -> Int -> Int

Data recieved callback

__onDisconnect : String -> Void

Disconnected callback

__onSecured : String -> Void

TLS negotiation complete callback

__onString : String -> Int

String recieved callback

connected(default,null) : Bool

Indicates if connected and ready to read and write.

host(default,setHost) : String

Hostname or IP address of the XMPP server.

http(default,null) : Bool

Indicates if this streams data connection is a HTTP (BOSH) connection (default is false)

secure(default,null) : Bool

Indicates if this is a secure connection

secured(default,null) : Bool

Indicates if TLS is negotiation is complete and data transfered is encrypted

Instance Methods

connect() : Void

disconnect() : Void

read(?yes : Bool) : Bool

Starts/Stops reading data input, returns true if successfully started

reset() : Void

setSecure() : Void

write(t : String) : Bool

Sends a string, returns true on succeess

writeBytes(t : haxe.io.Bytes) : Bool

Send raw bytes
